schema.description: Request to create a new micro-certification trigger rule.

auto_revoke.description: Whether to auto-revoke on timeout (default: true).

fallback_reviewer_id.description: Fallback reviewer user ID for escalation.

is_default.description: Mark as tenant-wide default for this trigger type (default: false).

name.description: Display name for the trigger rule (1-255 characters).

priority.description: Priority for rule matching (higher = matched first, default: 0).

reminder_threshold_percent.description: Send reminder at this % of deadline (1-99, default: 75).

allOf.description: Reviewer types for determining who reviews.
allOf.title: MicroCertReviewerType

scope_id.description: Scope ID (application/entitlement ID - required for non-tenant scope).

specific_reviewer_id.description: Specific reviewer user ID (required when `reviewer_type` is `specific_user`).

schema.title: CreateTriggerRuleRequest
